author: Deepa Seetharaman
title: Social-Media Mobs...
description: Social-Media Mobs... (First column, 8th story, link ) Related stories: Bill Gates, at Odds With Trump on Virus, Becomes Target... Drudge Report Feed needs your support! Become a Patron
content: Bill Gates last week posted a three-second video on Instagram of himself hanging a sign in a window reading Thank you health care workers. Over the following days, the post was pelted with hundreds of thousands of comments painting Mr. Gates as partisan, accu… [+269 chars]
